product_name: REI Cushioned Eye Mask and Earplugs Set
long_description: Block out the crying babies and bright lights so you can get some sound sleep with the REI Cushioned Eye Mask and Earplugs set. Eye mask features light-blocking fabric and soft padding to soothe your tired eyes; adjustable strap keeps mask in place. Corkscrew-style earplugs block up to 85% of irritating noise; cord connects earplugs to reduce the chance of dropping and losing one. Earplugs stow neatly in the mask storage pocket.
short_description: Block out the crying babies and bright lights so you can get some sound sleep with the REI Cushioned Eye Mask and Earplugs set.
